verbose_text: Synthesis and surface functionalization of CMK-3 : CMK-3 carbon material with a hexagonal mesopore arrangement was synthesized by mixing SBA-15 silica (2 g, treated hydrothermally at 130 degreesC) with a solution of sucrose (2.5 g) and concentrated H 2 SO 4 (280 mg) in H 2 O (10 mL) in a porcelain dish.
evidence: CMK-3: CMK-3 carbon material with a hexagonal mesopore arrangement was synthesized by mixing SBA-15 silica
